Some people would call you a liberal for that. Washington and all the other founding fathers… called liberals. _ Yes there are stupid Liberals… There are also stupid conservatives. (And the moment WAY more stupid Conservatives) But that’s just at the moment. Its swings back and forth quite a lot.  Using another great example. The Last really universally liked Republican POTUS (No not Reagan, I said universally) I’m speaking of Eisenhower… Ya he’s called a Liberal by a good part of the governing body of the GOP. A disease is defined as something that, if without medical intervention, will cause death. So, clearly, liberalism is not diseases. Liberalism and conservatism are political belief systems based on how people were brought up, where they brought up and what they have learned from various outlets in their lives. Some people change their political views when they get older. Sometimes drastically. Hillary Clinton was a Republican when she first got involved in politics in college, for example.
